name: Berry Granita
description: A refreshing dessert—perfect any time of the year, especially if you freeze your summer u-pick berries. Easy to prep; simply allow 4–6 hours to freeze prior to serving. This will be worth the wait, never have an excuse to miss your daily serving of fruit again!

ingredients.name: Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix or Strawberry Margarita Mix

preparation:
1. In two batches, pulse 2 cups strawberries and 1 1⁄2 tbsp Summer Berry Dip Mix in a blender or food processor until coarsely combined. Slowly add 1⁄3 cup water and pulse until smooth and thick, regularly scraping down sides with a spatula.
  2. Pour into an 11" x 7" non-stick pan. Freeze 4–6 hours, or until completely frozen.
  3. Return to blender and pulse briefly to create a thick slush, taking care not to over-blend.
  4. Spoon into individual dishes and serve immediately.
